Reviews.Title: “handy location - budget style”
Reviews.Author: jenny b
Reviews.Content: booking wotifcom price reasonable expecting basic style accommodation chose location relatively close vision eye institute clinic appointment laser surgery following morning staff friendly helpful style clean bed linen towels basic facilities considering highway location noisy able leave car carpark day reception arranged taxi overall pleasant experience excellent location

Reviews.Title: “not fit for animals”

Reviews.Content: hotel disgusting bad couldnt stay instead travelled 3hrs home day night social thread wet curtains ripped falling rails filthy staff couldnt care 2 hoots pigs stye fit animals humans kissed money goodbye
